knimeNode.name: Secure WebHDFS via KNOX Connection
knimeNode.shortDescription: Configures a WebHDFS connection using a KNOX gateway.

fullDescription.intro: This node configures the connection information that will be used to connect to a HDFS behind a Apache KNOX gateway using WebHDFS.

tab.name: General
tab.option: Full KNOX deployment URL including cluster name e.g. https://<server>:8443/gateway/<default>/webhdfs/v1 (replace <server> with the fully qualified hostname and <default> with you cluster/topology name). Protocol should be https and port 8443 on most deployments.
This node supports only HTTP basic authentication with username and password.

tab.name: Advanced
tab.option: Specify the timeout for the connection in milliseconds here.

ports.outPort: Port object containing the WebHDFS connection information.
